{{Description|A complimentary dish provided by the [[Coupon Cafeteria]] in the [[Fortress of Meropide]]. Normally, one person can receive one free meal full of surprises per day. This is the sole thing at the Fortress where full equality need not be bought with [[Credit Coupons|Coupons]].|Welfare Meals, [[Map]] Description}}
'''Bran''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Administrative Area]], [[Fortress of Meropide]], [[Fontaine]] that works at the [[Coupon Cafeteria]], appearing under the [[File:Icon Welfare Meals.png|25px]] map icon.

It will give the player a [[Welfare Meal]] once per day.

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Bran.png|Bran's location
NPC Location Bran and Wolsey Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Bran had been broken even before the [[Geode Mine Shaft]] ceased operations in the Fortress of Meropide. It was left in the [[Abandoned Production Zone]] for an unknown length of time before it was retrieved by [[Wolsey]] after [[Camden]] complained about the noises it made during his naps. Wolsey successfully repaired Bran and provided it a job at the Coupon Cafeteria.<ref name="Riqueti">{{Ref/NPC|Wolsey}}</ref>

===Appearance===
Bran takes on the appearance of a [[Nimble Harvester Mek - Pneuma]]. Its [[Arkhe]] alignment is disabled and colored gray.

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
Available the first time Bran is spoken to per day.
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Bran:''' Greetings. What can I do for you?
:{{DIcon}} I'd like a Welfare Meal, please.
:'''Bran:''' Understood.
:'''Bran:''' Enjoy your meal.
:;(Obtain {{Item|Welfare Meal|20|x=1}})
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
Available after obtaining a Welfare Meal from Bran.
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Bran:''' Greetings. What can I do for you?
:{{DIcon}} I'd like a Welfare Meal, please.
::'''Bran:''' Negative. According to the Fortress of Meropide's Coupon Cafeteria Regulations, only one Welfare Meal per day can be claimed per person.
:{{DIcon}} Nothing much.
::'''Bran:''' ...Understood.
{{Dialogue End}}
